overview: Adventure Bay's main rival wants to ruin Christmas. Mayor Harold Humdinger covets an undeserved gift and ruins Santa's plans. The Brave Puppies, along with Robops, must outrun Humdinger, help Santa deliver all the presents on time, and save the holiday. At this time, Santiago and his team are waiting for an exciting adventure to save Christmas! On the island of Encanto, the holiday is under threat: the treacherous Enrique sends a snowstorm to Santa and takes all the gifts for himself. But the wit and courage of Santiago and his team help to overcome all the traps of Enrique.
title: Paw Patrol. Mission Xmas
